prompt.text: When you sit down for a meal with Pakistanis, you should:

feedback.text: If you are offered multiple servings, you should accept as much as you can eat. Your hosts will take pride in giving you as much food as possible.

translation.text: Accept as much as you can eat.

feedback.text: Actually, you should not help yourself to food because your host will likely put food on your plate.
Actually, you should not start eating until the oldest person in the room has begun to eat.

translation.text: Be the first to start eating.

feedback.text: Actually, you should finish all of the food on your plate by the end of the meal.

translation.text: Leave some food on your plate.
